portfolio: Costumes Parisiens ou Le Journal des Dames et des Modes, (Paris, 1797-1836)

title: Banded hair decorated with Gauze and the Ears of Bears, the Invention of Mr. Guillaume, Tulle Dress with Satin Corset and Sleeves with Satin Strips, The Bottom is decorated with Gauze Flounces Gathered by Rolls of Satin
